title: I need help
body:
I run around the bronze 5 average of everything sometimes, where my kda is level 2 worthy and my cs is around 65 at 10.

Other times, I do some really impressive stuff (no this is not just another bronze stomping other bad bronzies) and for me it all comes down to being in the moment or at least "being in my game".

This is where I focus on nothing but what is happening in front of me, all distractions of my day and other rubbish going on in my head is silenced and I can play for a good un-interrupted 40 minutes. This doesn't happen often and most of the time I think far too much and not enough of what is happening in front of me.

For those on my friends list who can see my last normal match this is the case, that and having stiff fingers... but the point is that I don't know how to focus and shut out my thinking. Is there a process to occupy my mind with in game so I am at least addressing something rather then letting my mind wander?

If anyone would be willing to take some time to help I would be very grateful

replies.body:
twitch.tv/thrill3rrrr

Follow my stream and ask me any questions so I can help! :)

Thrill3r

Get some headphones. This will help you focus on your game more, it happened to me too when I didn't have my headphones and I had to use my speakers I wasn't used to it because I couldn't focus well because of my surroundings and what other things I hear. So get some good headphones that will block out sound from the outside. Hope this will help you focus.
sound card is broken, I use Bluetooth speakers
Hmm then I am not sure then but sorry I couldn't help though I think you just need to get used to the sounds you hear a lot.
